trans-unit.source: Describes the behavior that caused a <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll" /> event for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 描述导致 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll" /> 控件发生 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> 事件的行为。

trans-unit.source: The page buttons are not visible as buttons, but they occupy the space between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls on either end of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: 页按钮并不显示为按钮，但它们将占用之间的空间<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>的任意一端上的控件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>。

trans-unit.source: The user clicks a page button when clicking the left mouse button between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>.
trans-unit.target: 用户单击鼠标左键之间时，单击页按钮<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>。

trans-unit.source: The result of this action is to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> in the direction of the page button.
trans-unit.target: 此操作的结果是将移<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>按页按钮的方向。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the effect of the page buttons, see the descriptions of the LargeIncrement and LargeDecrement members.
trans-unit.target: 有关页按钮的效果的详细信息，请参阅的 LargeIncrement 和 LargeDecrement 成员的说明。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, including the page buttons.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示的元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>，包括页面按钮。

trans-unit.source: ![The different parts of a ScrollBar](~/add/media/scrollbarpagebutton.png "The different parts of a ScrollBar")
trans-unit.target: ![滚动条的不同部分](~/add/media/scrollbarpagebutton.png "滚动条的不同部分")

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> was dragged to a new position and is now no longer being dragged by the user.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> 已拖动到一个新位置，并且现在不再会由用户拖动。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> moved to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum" /> position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> 已移动到 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> 位置。

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, this movement occurs when the CTRL+HOME keys are pressed.
trans-unit.target: 对于一个垂直 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />，此移动在用户按下 Ctrl+Home 键时发生。

trans-unit.source: This movement corresponds to a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToTopCommand" /> in a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> and a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToLeftEndCommand" /> in a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: 此移动对应于垂直 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToTopCommand" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> 和水平 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToLeftEndCommand" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> moved a specified distance, as determined by the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange" />, to the left for a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> or upward for a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> 向左（对于水平 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange" />）或向上（对于垂直 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />）移动指定距离（由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> 的值确定）。

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, this movement occurs when the page button that is above the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> is pressed, or when the PAGE UP key is pressed, and corresponds to a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageUpCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 对于垂直 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />，此移动在用户按下 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> 上的页按钮或按下 Page Up 键时发生，并对应于 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageUpCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, this movement occurs when the page button to the left of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> is pressed, and corresponds to a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageLeftCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 对于水平 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />，此移动在用户按下 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> 左侧的页按钮时发生，并对应于 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageLeftCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> moved a specified distance, as determined by the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange" />, to the right for a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> or downward for a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> 向右（对于水平 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange" />）或向下（对于垂直 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />）移动指定距离（由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> 的值确定）。

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, this movement occurs when the page button that is below the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> is pressed, or when the PAGE DOWN key is pressed, and corresponds to a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageDownCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 对于垂直 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />，此移动在用户按下 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> 下的页按钮或按下 Page Down 键时发生，并对应于 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageDownCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, this movement occurs when the page button to the right of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> is pressed, and corresponds to a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageRightCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 对于水平 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />，此移动在用户按下 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> 右侧的页按钮时发生，并对应于 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageRightCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> moved to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum" /> position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> 已移动到 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> 位置。

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, this movement occurs when the CTRL+END keys are pressed.
trans-unit.target: 对于一个垂直 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />，此移动在用户按下 Ctrl+End 键时发生。

trans-unit.source: This movement corresponds to a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToEndCommand" /> in a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> and a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToRightEndCommand" /> in a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: 此移动对应于垂直 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToEndCommand" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> 和水平 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToRightEndCommand" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> moved a small distance, as determined by the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange" />, to the left for a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> or upward for a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> 向左（对于水平 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange" />）或向上（对于垂直 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />）移动一小段距离（由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> 的值确定）。

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, this movement occurs when the upper <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> is pressed or when the UP ARROW key is pressed, and corresponds to a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineUpCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 对于垂直 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />，此移动在用户按下上 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> 或按下向上键时发生，并对应于 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineUpCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, this movement occurs when the left <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> is pressed, and corresponds to a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineLeftCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 对于水平 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />，此移动在用户按下左 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> 时发生，并对应于 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineLeftCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> moved a small distance, as determined by the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange" />, to the right for a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> or downward for a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> 向右（对于水平 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange" />）或向下（对于垂直 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />）移动一小段距离（由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> 的值确定）。

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, this movement occurs when the lower <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> is pressed or when the DOWN ARROW key is pressed, and corresponds to a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineDownCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 对于垂直 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />，此移动在用户按下下 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> 或按下向下键时发生，并对应于 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineDownCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />, this movement occurs when the right <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> is pressed, and corresponds to a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineRightCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 对于水平 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />，此移动在用户按下右 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> 时发生，并对应于 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineRightCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> moved to a new position because the user selected **Scroll Here** in the shortcut menu of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> 已移动到新位置，因为用户在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> 的快捷菜单中选择了“滚动到此处”。

trans-unit.source: This movement corresponds to the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollHereCommand" />.
trans-unit.target: 此移动对应于 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollHereCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: To view the shortcut menu, right-click the mouse when the pointer is over the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: 要查看快捷菜单，可在指针位于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> 上方时右击鼠标。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> was dragged and caused a <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove" /> event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> 被拖动并导致了 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll" /> event of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType" /> may occur more than one time when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> is dragged in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" />.
trans-unit.target: 当在 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll" /> 中拖动 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollEventType" /> 时，可能多次发生此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar" /> 事件。
